item.description:
Please Donate or Walk with me! Support a Red Sox Native and Win Red Sox tickets at the 3nd Annual Walk for Teen Light on Saturday, June 4th from 9:30 am - 1:00 pm. This is a 5k Walk that begins and ends at Burlington Town Common with games, snacks, live music and a raffle that includes Red Sox tickets.

"Teen Leaders Inspired to Give Hope to Teens" is a group of 300 Burlington 8th graders raising money to end Bullying.  Their goal is to raise enough money to send the class to Project Adventure and still have some to donate.  We need walkers and donations.

It is $20 for adults to walk, $10 for kids. It is completely amazing to see what good teenagers are capable of doing. If you are unable to walk, donations in any amount will be more than welcome.

For more information or to make a donation though Amazon payments, please visit my blog at http://maryellenm15.blogspot.com/

or E Mail me at
maryellenm15@aol.com

Thank you again to those who have donated.
item.name: Donate or Walk,Win Red Sox Tickets at 3nd Annual Walk for Teen Light Burlington
